text: geudeul-i malhagil “geudaega ulileul wihae geudae junimkke gidohayeo, geugeos-ui saegkkal-i mueos-inji uliege bunmyeonghi seolmyeonghae dalla hasio.” geuga malhagil “sillo geubunkkeseo malsseumhasyeossnola : ‘geugeos-eun sillo hwangsaeg-ui amsoimyeo geu saegkkal-eun jit-eun galsaeg-euloseo boneun ideul-eul jeulgeobge hanola.’ ”
